entries.title: Enhance freedom to creativity with the Wondershare Filmora 12 update
entries.description: Wondershare Filmora 12 comes with new cross-platform capabilities and enhanced creative freedom

entries.title: There's another malicious PyPl package - this one stealing data from developers
entries.description: Threat actors tried abusing a legitimate cybersecurity firm to distribute an infostealing package.

entries.title: This critical Windows security flaw could be as serious as WannaCry, experts claim
entries.description: A patch is already available, though, so make sure to update your Windows devices.

entries.title: Google's data center water usage is revealed - and it's a lot
entries.description: City in Oregon reveals annual water usage of tech giant's local server farm following legal challenge.

entries.title: Sharing your Netflix, Prime Video or Disney Plus password could make you a criminal
entries.description: The UK government has issued worrying new guidance on the legalities of sharing streaming service passwords.

entries.title: ChatGPT is being used to create malicious emails and code
entries.description: With a few simple commands, researchers were able to create a malicious Excel file and a phishing email in ChatGPT.

entries.title: Consumer report blames Nintendo Switch Joy-Con drift on 'design flaw'
entries.description: A new report claims a “design flaw” is behind Joy-Con drift.

entries.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse poster might have spoiled its biggest surprises
entries.description: A new Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse poster might have ruined the appearance of some hugely popular Spider-People.

entries.title: DraftKings reveals thousands of customer accounts hit by cyberattack
entries.description: DraftKings users saw $300,000 stolen from their accounts, but the money has since been refunded.

entries.title: A required Windows 10 update brings the blue screen of death for some
entries.description: A mandatory update called KB5021233 is crashing PCs and freezing others - luckily there's a way to fix it.

entries.title: New AMD Ryzen 7000 price rumor could give Intel the edge
entries.description: The imminent battle of new Zen 4 versus Raptor Lake processors is shaping up to be a very interesting one.

entries.title: Google Meet just got much better captions
entries.description: Google Meet is getting better and better at automating the breaking of language barriers, but inclusion has been made an exclusive feature.

entries.title: The Witcher 3 PC patch released – maybe now my laptop will stop screaming at me
entries.description: CD Projekt RED has released a hotfix for PC versions of The Witcher 3 that addresses performance issues.

entries.title: Microsoft uncovers macOS flaw that could let malware run riot
entries.description: The Achilles flaw allows threat actors to bypass security measures in macOS.

entries.title: This new Adobe audio tool could make your home office sound like a studio
entries.description: Adobe Enhance Speech beta cleans up dirty audio with AI, but results are mixed.

entries.title: The DualSense Edge doesn't improve battery life – it makes it worse
entries.description: Sony has confirmed to TRG that the DualSense Edge will have less battery life than the standard DualSense controller.

entries.title: The World Cup final pushed Google Search to its highest traffic ever
entries.description: Google has had its best day ever thanks to the World Cup final, with Twitter also seeing strong results.

entries.title: Twitter Blue for Business now helps you track down your employees
entries.description: Yet another verification mark has been announced for Twitter users, this time to link accounts to parent accounts.

entries.title: Meta halts development of another major datacenter
entries.description: Meta claims move was to “implement design changes”, but it could signal increasingly worrying woes for the company and a shift in priorities to the metaverse.

entries.title: This amazing speaker design uses glass instead of wires
entries.description: Prototype wire-free hi-fi system from Zytronic and Pilkington  uses electrically conductive glass to power components

entries.title: Fortnite developer to pay record sum in fines and refunds to players
entries.description: The FTC has fined Epic Games for using "design tricks" to "dupe" players into making unintentional purchases.

entries.title: Microsoft Teams is adding one of the worst Zoom features
entries.description: Spice up those meetings with video filters on Microsoft Teams.

entries.title: The OnePlus 11 launch date has been confirmed
entries.description: The OnePlus 11 is landing on February 7, and a benchmark has shed more light on its specs.

entries.title: PSVR 2 controllers: everything you need to know about the PlayStation VR 2 Sense
entries.description: Curious about the PSVR 2 controllers? Here's everything you need to know about them.

entries.title: Poorly designed websites costing  ecommerce platforms billions in lost sales
entries.description: Consumers are keen to make more Christmas purchases online, but poor website design could compromise this.
